name: Userstyles.org Dark-N-Grey
description:
##########-------------------- PLEASE LEAVE A COMMENT AND RATING --------------------##########

My dark style contribution to this site.  This style also works in the forum.   Enjoy!

update 2/13/11:  added nice fixes and tweaks suggested by user "banthaz"
update 2/06/11:  fixes for new site changes.
update 1/22/11:  mores tweaks to new forums.
update 1/14/11:  updated new forum pages.
update 9/30/09:  updated to MOD WASTREL'S update to extend to star average ratings too.
update 9/20/09:  embedded MOD_WASTREL's (http://userstyles.org/users/838) star rating (http://userstyles.org/styles/20994) into the style.  Thanks!
update 9/16/09:  fixed everything for new site changes.
